card_text: Each time a "Six Samurai" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 2 Bushido Counters on this card. You can remove Bushido Counters from your field to activate these effects.$N●2 Counters: Target 1 "Six Samurai" or "Shien" Effect Monster; that target gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn.$N●4 Counters: Add 1 "Six Samurai" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand.$N●6 Counters: Target 1 "Shien" Effect Monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.
